name: Transient Worlds (NEW UPDATE)
description:
Explore randomly generated worlds of different types, each with its own set of unique objects, entities, and resources.

Build custom structures for fun, and for shelter. Discover different world types with varying levels of resources and geography. Almost all structures are destroyable, and will give part of the materials you spent when destroyed.

Hurl rocks and use fireballs to attack and defend against entities. Hunt animals for food, but be careful as death means losing everything in that world forever.

Create a new "Transient Being" to start fresh, or perform an inter-transient jump to continue your player progress and bring everything from your last Transient World to the next.

Take on the ultimate challenge of exploring the mysterious fourth world, filled with strange rocks, twisted trees, and glowing orbs.

Use the power of bloodstone to manipulate time and gain an advantage over your surroundings.

Screamers live in the fourth world. They can fly, and they're fast! But they tend to stick around a general area that they choose. Careful when approaching a Screamer.

Oh, and the robots are harmless, they're just scavengers.

Will you have what it takes to survive and thrive in this infinite world of Transient Worlds?

Controls:

WASD - Move

1, 2 - Harvest / Fireball Mode

Q - Throw Rock

I - Action Menu

B - Build Menu

E - Build Selected Structure

F5 - Enter Command

Commands:

player.teleport   -   Prompts player with (x, y, z). Click "OK" when ready

player.heal   -   Heals the player

give.   -   Gives the specified material x20

spawn. - Spawns the specified entity next to you

And more!

Changelog:

Revamped build controls

New commands

Bug fixes
